thread.section_title: Hotel Magellan - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Value
thread.title_full: Great Value - Review of Hotel Magellan, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: CaptainFantastic747
title: Great Value
text:
Great place in the heart of town. A very nice breakfast buffet, with fresh orange juice from an automated machine that cuts and squeezes the oranges. Pretty cool. Quiet and safe. Rooms very small but the price can't be beat.
Room Tip: Rooms are small but adequate. Very few outlets to plug in devices. I use a CPAP and had to sleep on... See more room tips
